data: Learn how to build modern web applications with SvelteKit, a powerful framework for creating fast and efficient websites.

Getting Started with SvelteKit

SvelteKit is an exciting framework for building web applications. In this post, weâ€™ll explore its key features and how to get started.

Why SvelteKit?

SvelteKit offers several advantages:

  1. Speed: SvelteKit apps are incredibly fast out of the box.
  2. Simplicity: The framework is easy to learn and use.
  3. Flexibility: SvelteKit supports various rendering methods.

Setting Up Your First Project

To create a new SvelteKit project, run:

npm create svelte@latest my-svelte-app
cd my-svelte-app
npm install
npm run dev
